name: Api\Objects\Error
description: See the properties of an error returned by the Apple News API.

properties.name: code
properties.description: An error code that, in combination with the keyPath, uniquely identifies the error for the specified endpoint.

properties.name: keyPath
properties.description: An array of field names that uniquely identifies a field in the JSON input of the request. See Understanding the keyPath Array.

properties.name: message
properties.description: A user friendly detailed explanation of the error code.

properties.name: status
properties.description: A code issued by the server in response to a request.

properties.name: value
properties.description: If applicable, the value supplied in the request for the field that is specified by keyPath.
